mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE_ANALYSIS (IMAGE_ANALYSIS_SQ, ANGER, CONTEMPT, FEAR, DISGUST, HAPPINESS, LAUGH, NATURAL, SADNESS, SURPRISED, FACE_TOP, FACE_LEFT, FACE_WIDTH, FACE_HEIGHT, ANS_SQ) VALUES (IMAGE_ANALYSIS_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{anger}, #{contempt}, #{fear}, #{disgust}, #{happiness}, #{laugh}, #{natural}, #{sadness}, #{surprised}, #{faceTop}, #{faceLeft}, #{faceWidth}, #{faceHeight}, #{ansSq})
